articles.title: Asia Times interview: Tok Mat says full context is on right to fair trial for all - Malaysiakini
articles.description: He stresses that article should be read in totality for real picture.
articles.content: Umno deputy president Mohamad Hasan has insisted that his statements made in a recent interview with Hong Kong-based Asia Times must be read in totality and in its full context of the right of all in… [+301 chars]

articles.title: Tan Boon Hui, Arts House Limited executive director and former Singapore Art Museum director, dies at 53 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The veteran Singaporean arts administrator, who died on Jul 7, led SAM for five years and organised two editions of the Singapore Biennale. He also had a stint as the director of the prestigious Asia Society Museum in New York.
articles.content:
Arts House Limiteds (AHL) executive director Tan Boon Hui died on Thursday (Jul 7). The veteran arts administrator was 53 years old.
Tan died from complications due to a stroke. According to reports… [+2780 chars]

articles.title: Vosotros tows Gilas Men 3x3 to Asia Cup main draw; Gilas Women bow out - Rappler
articles.description: PBA 3x3 champion guard Almond Vosotros showcases his stellar outside shooting to lift Gilas Pilipinas to the 2022 FIBA 3x3 Asia Cup main draw
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines Gilas Pilipinas Men marched to the 2022 FIBA 3×3 Asia Cup with a pair of wins against Jordan and Indonesia in the qualifying draw on Thursday, July 7 in Singapore.
